translations.Server added to the list of trusted ownC: Server added to the list of trusted ownClouds
translations.Server is already in the list of trusted: Server is already in the list of trusted servers.
translations.ownCloud Federation allows you to connec: ownCloud Federation allows you to connect with other trusted ownClouds to exchange the user directory. For example this will be used to auto-complete external users for federated sharing.
